# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Compute unique hash of this object.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to combine the properties into.

## Hashing and comparing

- **==(_:_:)**: Two endpoints are logically equivalent if they have the same service type (publish vs subscribe) with the same name, and refer to the same device.
